location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage which has slightly obscured the date of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement and reply to a letter dated 25 August 1807. It notes that the Resident is pleased that the Government of Bombay approves of his conduct in an undisclosed matter.
